about.short-description: I strive to give my best so that it is reflected in good work.
about.description: I have worked on comprehensive technological solutions for clinics and hospitals, integrating both management software and the workforce of each institution, achieving technological implementations that endure over time. Throughout my career, I have accumulated valuable experience in accounting and administrative processes, thanks to my involvement in various implementation projects.

short-profile.description: Currently, I work as a front-end developer and back-end.
short-profile.skills: HTML, CSS, React, Angular, GraphQL, Contenfull

summary.title: My Preparation and Experience
summary.first-job-description: Implementation of CNT software in various hospitals in Colombia with an emphasis on administrative and healthcare aspects.
summary.second-job-description: Provided technical support, especially in administrative areas.
summary.third-job-description: Managed the CNT ERP system. Also led an interdisciplinary team and was responsible for staff training.
summary.fourth-job-description: Developed web components using React, Next.js, and Material UI.
summary.last-job-description: Developed an ERP using Angular and NestJS. Also worked on implementing new features and bug fixes.
